permafrost.tundra.math.gauss

Class ConcurrentEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.math.gauss.Estimator
      • permafrost.tundra.math.gauss.ConcurrentEstimator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServiceEstimator

    public class ConcurrentEstimator
extends Estimator
    Class for incrementally calculating the mean and standard deviation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  ConcurrentEstimator.Sample
      Represents a single sample.

      protected java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock lock
      The lock used to synchronize access by multiple read and write threads.
      protected java.util.Deque<ConcurrentEstimator.Sample> samples
      Use a sample queue to reduce thread synchronization required by estimator.
